name: What do cats dream of ?
description:
What do cats dream of ?

Do you know what our fluffy friends dream about? In this game, you'll explore a cat dream. In each level, you'll go deeper and deeper in this complex dumb mind...  🐱

***

***

Goal

Feed the cat & try to survive as long as you can. Don't forget... Make combo to get a great score!

SHARE YOUR HIGHEST SCORE!

***

How to Play

* Drag and drop the cat bowl with your mouse (left button).

* Click on a cat to smash it (mouse left button).

* Move the mouse around cat to distract it.

***

How it was made

This game was made by 2 brothers in 2 days with Unity and Blender.

Hope you'll enjoy it

Made with love and flowers by :

Simon Giraud - https://twitter.com/Labelpastek

Matthieu Giraud - https://twitter.com/matthieu_giraud

Discord : https://discord.gg/yvpjDPU

BE CAREFUL SPOILER BELOW!!!⚠️ Tips and tricks to get a high score

Spoiler alert! You should play once before reading the tips and tricks 😉

  1. Feed (at least) two cats completely to get a combo, each cats' combo give you a nice score bonus.
  2. For each combo level, all cats' combo timer will be reset, so the cats won't be hungry.
  3. !Shake the mouse near the cat to distract it. A distracted cat get hungry slower.
  4. If you smash a cat on the ground, it will get a very hungry after a delay. BUT! If you feed the cat before the end of the delay, you won't get a penalty.
  5.  Smash a "combo cat" on the ground cancel the combo, so be careful!
